00018 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 //! \brief  Standard USB device descriptor
00020 //! \see    S_usb_device_descriptor
00021 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 static const S_usb_device_descriptor sDevice = 
00023 {
00024     sizeof(S_usb_device_descriptor), //!< Size of this descriptor
00025     USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR,           //!< DEVICE Descriptor Type
00026     USB2_00,                         //!< USB 2.0 specification
00027     USB_CLASS_COMMUNICATION,         //!< USB Communication class code
00028     0x00,                            //!< No device subclass code
00029     0x00,                            //!< No device protocol code
00030     USB_ENDPOINT0_MAXPACKETSIZE,     //!< Maximum packet size for endpoint zero
00031     SER_VENDOR_ID,                   //!< Vendor ID
00032     SER_PRODUCT_ID,                  //!< Product ID
00033     SER_RELEASE_NUMBER,              //!< Device release number
00034     0x01,                            //!< Index of manufacturer description
00035     0x02,                            //!< Index of product description
00036     0x03,                            //!< Index of serial number description
00037     0x01                             //!< One possible configuration
00038 };
00039 
00040 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 //! \brief  Device configuration descriptor
00042 //! \see    S_ser_configuration_descriptor
00043 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 static const S_ser_configuration_descriptor sConfiguration = 
00045 {
00046     //! Standard configuration descriptor
00047     {
00048         sizeof(S_usb_configuration_descriptor), //!< Descriptor size
00049         USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR,           //!< CONFIGURATION descriptor type
00050         sizeof(S_ser_configuration_descriptor), //!< Total size of this configuration 
00051                                                 //!< (including other descriptors)
00052         0x02,                   //!< Two interfaces are used by this configuration
00053         0x01,                   //!< Value 0x01 is used to select this configuration
00054         0x00,                   //!< No string is used to describe this configuration
00055         //! TODO: Is this OK?
00056         //! bmAttributes: Device is self-powered and supports remote wakeup
00057         (1 << 7) | USB_CONFIG_SELF_POWERED | USB_CONFIG_REMOTE_WAKEUP,
00058         USB_POWER_MA( 100 )     //!< Maximum power consumption of the device is 100mA
00059     },
00060     //! Communication class interface descriptor
00061     {
00062         sizeof(S_usb_interface_descriptor),
00063         USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR,        //!< INTERFACE Descriptor Type
00064         0x00,                            //!< Interface 0
00065         0x00,                            //!< No alternate settings
00066         0x01,                            //!< One endpoint used
00067         CDC_INTERFACE_COMMUNICATION,     //!< Communication interface class
00068         CDC_ABSTRACT_CONTROL_MODEL,      //!< Abstract control model subclass
00069         0x01,                            //!< No protocol code
00070         0x00                             //!< No associated string descriptor
00071     },
00072     //! Header functional descriptor
00073     {
00074         sizeof(S_cdc_header_descriptor),
00075         CDC_CS_INTERFACE,                //!< CS_INTERFACE descriptor type
00076         CDC_HEADER,                      //!< Header functional descriptor
00077         CDC1_10,                         //!< CDC version 1.10
00078     },
00079     //! Call management functional descriptor
00080     {
00081         sizeof(S_cdc_call_management_descriptor),
00082         CDC_CS_INTERFACE,                //!< CS_INTERFACE type
00083         CDC_CALL_MANAGEMENT,             //!< Call management descriptor
00084         0x01,                            //!< Call management is handled by the device
00085         0x01                             //!< Data interface is 0x01
00086     },
00087     //! Abstract control management functional descriptor
00088     {
00089         sizeof(S_cdc_abstract_control_management_descriptor),
00090         CDC_CS_INTERFACE,                //!< CS_INTERFACE descriptor type
00091         CDC_ABSTRACT_CONTROL_MANAGEMENT, //!< Abstract control management 
00092                                          //!<   functional descriptor
00093         0x07                             //!< Every notification/request except 
00094                                          //!<   NetworkConnection supported
00095     },
00096     //! Union functional descriptor with one slave interface
00097     {
00098         //! Union functional descriptor
00099         {
00100             sizeof(S_cdc_union_descriptor) + 1,
00101             CDC_CS_INTERFACE,            //!< CS_INTERFACE descriptor type
00102             CDC_UNION,                   //!< Union functional descriptor
00103             0x00,                        //!< Master interface is 0x00
00104         },                               //!<   (Communication class interface)
00105         { 0x01 }                         //!< First slave interface is 0x01
00106     },                                   //!<   (Data class interface)
00107     //! Notification endpoint descriptor
00108     {
00109         sizeof(S_usb_endpoint_descriptor),
00110         USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR,            //!< ENDPOINT descriptor type
00111         USB_ENDPOINT_IN | SER_EPT_NOTIFICATION, //!< IN endpoint, address = 0x03
00112         ENDPOINT_TYPE_INTERRUPT,            //!< INTERRUPT endpoint type
00113         64,                                 //!< Maximum packet size is 64 bytes
00114         0x10                                //!< Endpoint polled every 10 ms
00115     },
00116     //! Data class interface descriptor
00117     {
00118         sizeof(S_usb_interface_descriptor),
00119         USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR,           //!< INTERFACE descriptor type
00120         0x01,                               //!< Interface 0x01
00121         0x00,                               //!< No alternate settings
00122         0x02,                               //!< Two endpoints used
00123         CDC_INTERFACE_DATA,                 //!< Data class code
00124         0x00,                               //!< No subclass code
00125         0x00,                               //!< No protocol code TODO? CDC_PROTOCOL_TRANSPARENT
00126         0x00                                //!< No description string
00127     },
00128     //! Bulk-OUT endpoint descriptor
00129     {
00130         sizeof(S_usb_endpoint_descriptor),
00131         USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR,           //!< ENDPOINT descriptor type
00132         USB_ENDPOINT_OUT | SER_EPT_DATA_OUT, //!< OUT endpoint, address = 0x01
00133         ENDPOINT_TYPE_BULK,                //!< Bulk endpoint
00134         64,                                //!< Endpoint size is 64 bytes
00135         0x00                               //!< Must be 0x00 for full-speed bulk endpoints
00136     },    
00137     //! Bulk-IN endpoint descriptor
00138     {
00139         sizeof(S_usb_endpoint_descriptor),
00140         USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR,           //!< ENDPOINT descriptor type
00141         USB_ENDPOINT_IN | SER_EPT_DATA_IN, //!< IN endpoint, address = 0x02
00142         ENDPOINT_TYPE_BULK,                //!< Bulk endpoint
00143         64,                                //!< Endpoint size is 64 bytes
00144         0x00                               //!< Must be 0x00 for full-speed bulk endpoints
00145     },  
00146 };

00247 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00248 //      Internal methods

00251 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00252 //! \brief   Sets asynchronous line-character formatting properties
00253 //! \details This function is used as a callback when receiving the data part
00254 //!          of a SET_LINE_CODING request.
00255 //! \see     usbcdc11.pdf - Section 6.2.12
00256 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00257  void CCDC::OnSetLineCoding( CCDC* pThis )
00258 {
00259     pThis->pDriver->SendZLP0 ();
00260 
00261     TRACE_INFO
00262     ( 
00263         "SetLineCoding(%d,%d,%d,%d)\n",
00264         pThis->sLineCoding.dwDTERate,
00265         pThis->sLineCoding.bCharFormat,
00266         pThis->sLineCoding.bParityType,
00267         pThis->sLineCoding.bDataBits
00268         );
00269 }
00270 
00271 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00272 //      Public methods
00273 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00274 
00275 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00276 //! \brief  SETUP request handler for an Abstract Control Model device
00277 //! \see    usbcdc11.pdf - Section 6.2
00278 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00279 void CCDC::RequestHandler( void )
00280 {
00281     S_usb_request* pSetup = pDriver->GetSetup ();
00282 
00283     TRACE_DEBUG_M( "NewReq " );
00284 
00285     // Handle the request
00286     //
00287     switch( pSetup->bRequest )
00288     {
00289         //-----------------------
00290         case CDC_SET_LINE_CODING:
00291         //-----------------------
00292             TRACE_DEBUG_M( "sLineCoding " );
00293     
00294             // Start the read operation with ACM_SetLineCoding as the callback
00295             pDriver->Read
00296             (
00297                  0, // endpoint
00298                  (void*) &(sLineCoding), // data
00299                  sizeof(S_cdc_line_coding), // data len
00300                  Callback_f( OnSetLineCoding ), this // callback
00301                  );
00302             break;
00303     
00304         //-----------------------
00305         case CDC_GET_LINE_CODING:
00306         //-----------------------
00307             TRACE_DEBUG_M( "gLineCoding " );
00308     
00309             // Sends the currently configured line coding to the host
00310             // \see usbcdc11.pdf - Section 6.2.13
00311             //
00312             pDriver->Write( 0, &sLineCoding,  sizeof( S_cdc_line_coding ) );
00313             break;
00314     
00315         //------------------------------
00316         case CDC_SET_CONTROL_LINE_STATE:
00317         //------------------------------
00318             TRACE_DEBUG_M( "sControlLineState " );
00319     
00320             // Sets the state of control line parameters.
00321             // \see usbcdc11.pdf - Section 6.2.14
00322             //
00323             isCarrierActivated = ISSET( pSetup->wValue, CDC_ACTIVATE_CARRIER );
00324             isPresentDTE = ISSET( pSetup->wValue, CDC_DTE_PRESENT );
00325     
00326             TRACE_INFO( "SetControlLineState(DTE=%d,DCD=%d)\n", 
00327                         isPresentDTE, isCarrierActivated );
00328     
00329             pDriver->SendZLP0 ();
00330                 
00331             break;
00332     
00333         //------
00334         default:
00335         //------
00336             // Forward request to standard request handler
00337             //
00338             CSTD::RequestHandler ();
00339     
00340             break;
00341     }
00342 }
00343 
00344 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00345 //! \brief   Initializes a CDC serial driver
00346 //! \details This method sets the standard descriptors of the device and the
00347 //!          default CDC configuration.
00348 //! \param   usbDriver USB driver instance that servers this object
00349 //! \param   board Hardware board abstraction instance
00350 //! \param   eventSink Event sink isntance that handles this object
00351 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00352 CCDC::CCDC( CUsbDriver* usbDriver, CBoard* board, CEventSink* eventSink )
00353     : CSTD( usbDriver, board, eventSink )
00354 {
00355     TRACE_INFO( "CCDC %08x, Driver=%08x\n", uint( this ), pDriver );
00356 
00357     // Initialize the list of endpoints
00358     //
00359     EndpointList[ 0 ].Init( 1 ); // Endpoint 0 (Control endpoint 0) with Single bank
00360     EndpointList[ 1 ].Init( 2 ); // Endpoint 1 (Data out endpoint) with Dual bank
00361     EndpointList[ 2 ].Init( 2 ); // Endpoint 2 (Data in endpoint) with Dual bank
00362     EndpointList[ 3 ].Init( 1 ); // Endpoint 3 (Notification endpoint) with Single bank
00363 
00364     // Announce our endpoints to usb device driver
00365     //
00366     pDriver->SetEndpointList( EndpointList, NUM_ENDPOINTS );
00367 
00368     // Initialize standard class attributes
00369     //
00370     pDescriptors = &sDescriptors;
00371 
00372     // Initialize Line Coding ACM attributes
00373     //
00374     sLineCoding.dwDTERate   = 0;
00375     sLineCoding.bCharFormat = 0;
00376     sLineCoding.bParityType = 0;
00377     sLineCoding.bDataBits   = 0;
00378 
00379     // Initialize Carrier ACM attributes
00380     //
00381     isCarrierActivated = false;
00382     isPresentDTE       = false;
00383 }
